channel.title: Tornait - Heritage Playlist (Remix Contest!)
channel.description:
Tornait here. I have a playlist, full of all my forgotten/little known stuff, called Heritage. To celebrate, I’m doing a remix challenge!
Your challenge, if you choose to accept it, is to remix a few selected tracks from the Heritage playlist: Cosmic Sprinkles, Mockingbird Lane, Express, Sunbeams Through Clouds, Rain Down, and Arcadia.
Rules:
* You can remix only two of the six songs, but you can remix any two songs. If you want to, you can remix just one song.
* You can change the instruments in the loops, but you can’t delete any instruments or loops. However, you can add loops, and tweak the automation to your liking. And yes, you can in fact add drums.
* You can also change tempo, swing and even key, as long as elements of the original song remain noticable in the remix. This means genres, too... so if you wanna flip a normally chill song into a hard, heavy beat... GO FOR IT! Nothing’s stopping ya!
* There are no rules for cover art, but the name of the posted song should look like this: (song name) by Tornait - (your remix name here)
Alright! Link to the playlist is here; https://soundcloud.com/tornait-jaybird/sets/heritage-tornaits-forgotten
Now for the stems! Special thanks to @HAYVN for helping me with these!
Cosmic Sprinkles https://app.auxy.co/projects/nlgEXFIcUliFe7i_kVyl5w==
Express https://app.auxy.co/projects/a91b0YuObwor2IMCR7UirA==
Mockingbird Lane https://app.auxy.co/projects/NXJQggOtfe6uOacJ9SA8ng==
Sunbeams Through Clouds https://app.auxy.co/projects/AMe12cum9j5Iq974Esg8tg==
Rain Down https://app.auxy.co/projects/0hNz0JkNM-TYJxymsDeieQ==
Arcadia https://app.auxy.co/projects/arCDYAoCj5XSU4uEC28Ltw==
Submissions must be in by January 8th! Winners shall be announced then! Every remixed song will be reposted and put in a special playlist!
**EDIT**: Submission date has been changed to January 19th! Come on everybody! A few more days!
Remix contests are a great way to show the talent that this community has. I truly hope you all enjoy remixing these songs. Happy remixing!
Edit: previously the playlist link was actually an auxy project link. I seriously derped on that. Now you guys can go and listen to the original songs! REJOICE!

item.description:
Thanks so much @tornait for sharing your tracks, since this is my first time to be in the top 8 (at any remixes contest) i really appreciate it.

great to know @wagneric is in the top 8 as well (with his piano expertise on the Express)
And congrats to all in the top 8!

Anyway, do let me know how could the Collab “project” starts, really need your guidance

so for now i’ll just keep on Auxy’ing

item.title: Tornait - Heritage Playlist (Remix Contest!)
item.dc:creator: tornait
item.description:
ALRIGHT EVERYONE IT’S UP! FINAL RESULTS ARE IN!

https://soundcloud.com/tornait-jaybird/sets/heritage-playlist-tornaits

Would love to thank everyone for participating! The top 8 are…

  1. @cgedius - Rain Down Remix
  2. @HYDRANS - Rain Down Remix
  3. @HELIXX - Express Remix
  4. @TROPTA - Cosmic Sprinkles Remix
  5. @wagneric - Express Remix
  6. @Indigoo - Arcadia Remix
  7. @therealejoc - Rain Down Remix
  8. @Bassment_Chemists - Mockingbird Lane Remix

True to my word, top three get to have collabs with me. But, I’m going to be generous. I’m going to extend my collabs to the top 8. And if you didn’t place, or were too late… Don’t sweat it! You have my eternal gratitude for remixing one of my track (and I might ask you for a collab in the future.) Remember, everyone’s hard work is apreciated!

The real reason I made this remix contest is so that people can look back at their old stuff— and look at it in a new way. Take the time to revisit the old stuff you made and look at how far you’ve come! Constantly build up on those old themes and keep them fresh and exciting! Also, I hope that this contest allows people to start remixing other people’s stuff too. It really reminds me of this one quote I heard long ago: “If you can take another person’s painting and make it yours, then you are truly a gifted artist.”

One last thing. If you missed the deadline, don’t be discouraged! Still post your remixes here, and I’ll add them to the other remix playlists. That way, you’ll still get recognition.

THANK YOU EVERYBODY!!!

Read full topic
